programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: When teenager Scott McCall (Tyler Posey) is convinced by his best friend, Stiles (Dylan O'Brien), to join a search in the woods for a missing body, something comes out of the darkness to take a bite out of his side, changing his life forever.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Not aware that he has become a werewolf, Scott (Tyler Posey) must deal with hunters trying to catch him, another werewolf (Tyler Hoechlin) and the pressures of normal teen life, all while trying to get a second date with Allison (Crystal Reed).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott's (Tyler Posey) first date with Allison (Crystal Reed) ends up in confusion and turns into a dreaded "group date." Meanwhile, a mystery animal attack has Sheriff Stilinski (Linden Ashby) and the rest of Beacon Hills on the lookout.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With his life in danger, Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) is forced to make reluctant allies out of Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien). While Scott tries to survive dinner with Allison's father (JR Bourne), Stiles attempts to keep Derek alive.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: A new animal attack raises more questions among authorities. And when Scott (Tyler Posey) and Allison (Crystal Reed) skip school unannounced, Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) must deal with the ever more aggressive werewolf hunters on his own.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) come up with ways for Scott to control the transformation in order to be with Allison (Crystal Reed), while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) attempts to make an ally of Scott in his battle with the hunters.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: When Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) is savagely attacked by the Alpha, Scott (Tyler Posey), Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) and their friends find themselves trapped in Beacon Hills High School at night where they face both questions and suspicions about each other.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) on the run from Sheriff Stilinski (Linden Ashby), Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) must help Scott (Tyler Posey) face his second full moon. Meanwhile, Jackson (Colton Haynes) tries to get closer to Allison (Crystal Reed).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Clues, including a prior encounter with Derek (Tyler Hoechlin), bring Jackson (Colton Haynes) to a dangerous revelation about Scott (Tyler Posey)…and his actions begin to threaten not only Scott's life, but his own as well.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With startling revelations weighing in on him, Scott (Tyler Posey) finds himself scrambling to protect the people he loves, including Allison (Crystal Reed) who begins to follow clues left by her Aunt Kate about her family history.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: While struggling with family secrets, Allison (Crystal Reed) focuses on the Winter Formal dance. Meanwhile, as the tensions between werewolves and hunters rise to a boiling point, Scott (Tyler Posey) struggles to protect both friends and enemies.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the season finale, Scott McCall (Tyler Posey) discovers one last clue which allows him to enlist both friends -- and even a previous enemy -- in order to stop the mysterious killings and win back Allison (Crystal Reed), the girl he loves.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: When Lydia (Holland Roden) goes missing from the hospital, werewolves and hunters alike begin a search to discover not only where she is, but what she may have become. Meanwhile Jackson's (Colton Haynes) body seems to be fighting against the bite.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: The night before a full moon, Isaac's father (John Wesley Shipp) is murdered. When Isaac (Daniel Sharman) is arrested, Scott (Tyler Posey), Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) and Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) resolve to break him out before the Argents get to him.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) tries to stop Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) from creating new werewolves, while Chris Argent (JR Bourne) decides to officially begin Allison's (Crystal Reed) training. Meanwhile, the new creature in Beacon Hills takes another victim.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: When the shapeshifter strikes again, Scott (Tyler Posey) has to recruit a reluctant Allison (Crystal Reed) to acquire a rare book from Gerard's (guest star Michael Hogan) collection, while also once again surviving dinner with the Argents.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) becomes convinced that Lydia (Holland Roden) is the shapeshifter they're after since she seemed immune to its toxin, forcing Scott (Tyler Posey) to gather his friends -- and even some enemies -- to protect her.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With startling new information about the shapeshifter, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) hurry to protect their friends while Allison (Crystal Reed) is given an investigative task by her family. And there is "panic at the disco."

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Lydia (Holland Roden) makes connections about the bite from Peter (Ian Bohen). Jackson (Colton Haynes) causes problems for Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) has a crisis of faith in his leadership abilities.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: During a secret concert, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) come up with a method to trap the new shapeshifter. At the same time, Allison's mother (Eaddy Mays) comes up with a plan of her own to take care of Scott once and for all.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Even as his relationship with Allison (Crystal Reed) is further strained, Scott (Tyler Posey) must attend Lydia's (Holland Roden) birthday party while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) locks up his new wolves on their first full moon together.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With a secret revealed, Scott (Tyler Posey), Stiles (Dylan O'Brien), Melissa and Stilinski are taken hostage in the Sheriff's station. Allison (Crystal Reed) then tracks Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) to the station, bringing Argent and Gerard with her.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Scott (Tyler Posey) must help win the championship lacrosse game while also trying to figure out how to stop Gerard (Michael Hogan). At the same time, Alison (Crystal Reed) and Argent (JR Bourne) continue their hunt of Derek (Tyler Hoechlin).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the second season finale, although everyone is still reeling from a shocking death on the lacrosse field, Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends rush to figure out Gerard's (Michael Hogan) master plan…but Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) has his own plan.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: In the exciting Season 3 premiere, a new Alpha Pack arrives to wreak havoc on Scott's (Tyler Posey) life, while Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) and Isaac (Daniel Sharman) struggle to locate Erica (Gage Golightly) and Boyd (Sinqua Walls).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Allison and Lydia stumble on a clue to finding Boyd and Erica, while a childhood friend of Stiles goes missing. Meanwhile, Derek is surprised by the reappearance of someone from his past…someone he thought had died in the Hale house fire.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: With Boyd (Sinqua Walls) and Cora (Adelaide Kane) on the loose and under the influence of the full moon, Scott (Tyler Posey) and Derek (Tyler Hoechlin) find that they may have to turn to an unlikely ally for help…Chris Argent (JR Bourne).

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: While Scott (Tyler Posey) tries to keep Isaac (Daniel Sharman) from engaging in a deadly confrontation with the Twins in school, Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) attempts to prove his theory that the killings have absolutely nothing to do with werewolves.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: During a bus ride to a cross country meet, Scott (Tyler Posey) and his friends flash back to the events of a preemptive strike against the Alphas that has left several injured and possibly one or more dead.

programme.title: Teen Wolf
programme.desc: Stranded at a motel in Fairvale, California for the night because of a postponed meet, Scott (Tyler Posey) and the others suffer strange experiences that cause them to believe members of their own group may the mysterious killer's newest targets.
